svcproc.title: WALL CHARTS
svcproc.para: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) has prepared two charts which are to be posted in the rim wheel service area. These charts alert service personnel of the hazards involved when working with multi-piece wheels.
One chart is called "Safety Chart" which illustrates the proper safety precautions to be followed when servicing truck and bus multi-piece wheels.
The second chart is called "Matching Chart" which provides the guidance of various wheel makes and components which can be safely interchanged.
